trans-unit.source: Defines IDs for several built-in SharePoint nodes in **Server Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 为服务器资源管理器中多个内置 SharePoint 节点定义 ID。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.ExplorerNodeTypes> values with the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.ExplorerNodeTypeAttribute> to specify a built-in SharePoint node that you want to extend.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.ExplorerNodeTypes>值与<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.ExplorerNodeTypeAttribute>指定你想要扩展的内置 SharePoint 节点。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Extend a SharePoint Node in Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-extend-a-sharepoint-node-in-server-explorer.md) and [How to: Add a Custom SharePoint Node to Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 扩展服务器资源管理器中的 SharePoint 节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-extend-a-sharepoint-node-in-server-explorer.md)和[如何： 向服务器资源管理器中添加自定义 SharePoint 节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer.md)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the ID for site connection nodes in **Server Explorer** (nodes that display site URLs).
trans-unit.target: 为服务器资源管理器中的站点连接节点（显示站点 URL 的节点）指定 ID。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the ID for parent nodes in **Server Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 为服务器资源管理器中的父节点指定 ID。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the ID for site nodes in **Server Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 为服务器资源管理器中的站点节点指定 ID。
